name: platypus milker
description:
have you ever wondered can you milk a platypus? if yes then this is the game for you, if not the you need to start wondering if you can milk a platypus and then you need to get this game cause its great. also i have no idea if you can milk a platypus in real life but i do know that you can on a pc thanks to me so your welcome in advance.
